name: Wally
description: From the old Woody Woodpecker cartoon.

name: Zeus
description: Currently in captivity at Marineland in Canada.

name: ET
description: Deceased: Formerly a resident of Point Defiance Zoo in Tacoma, WA.

name: Nereus
description: Deceased: Nereus was a beloved walrus who lived at the Indianapolis, IN zoo. He was famous for being discovered as an abandoned baby walrus and starred in a film called "Growing Up Walrus" which documented his rehabilitation.
